name: Sex, Drugs & Depression
description:
So you wanna get your weltschmertz out into the world? Join our band. Tour. I'll manage the money. You'll manage the fame. Or don't. It's yours. Or not. Well... whatever... nevermind. But you can't smash this.

A suicidal grunge band manager simulator by:

Anna Olchowik

Paweł Cichocki

Piotr Kucharski
